transcript:
Customer: [inaudible] teen din ke andar uska tight rehta hai.
Customer: Unka teen din ka tight rehta hai.
Customer: Ye jo product vagera sare dhang se upload karwayenge ki nahi karwayenge? [inaudible]
Executive: Sir ye Fine Moti Udyog se baat ho rahi hai, Mr. Rawat Sahab?
Customer: Aaiye, aaiye.
Executive: Sir, main Mohammad Taufiq baat kar raha tha, IndiaMART se, Senior Manager.
Customer: Ji sir.
Customer: Ji sir, badhiya sir, badhiya.
Executive: Sir ye aapka hamare customer care pe ek call aaya tha.
Executive: To koi issue face kar rahe the aap apni services ke regarding, to uske regarding hi maine description dene ke liye aapko call kiya hai.
Customer: Asal mein aap mere ko nahi hai aapne isliye kara hai aapne Nidhi karke ek mera account handle kar rahi hai, madam.
Executive: Meri team mein hai sir wo.
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Meri team mein hai jo aapka account manage kar rahi hai sir, unse koi problem hai? Achha wo aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi unse waisi koi meri problem nahi hai. Mera maine unko complaint likhaya tha parso.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Haan, maine mal deliver kara mere ko payment nahi hua hai, bola tha.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapne jo mal deliver kiya hai sir wo kis company ko kiya hai?
Customer: Maine details bheji hai WhatsApp pe Nidhi ji ko aap check kariye.
Executive: Nidhi, sir ne company ki details bheji hai aapko? Mujhe WhatsApp karo.
Executive: To ye kab deal hui thi aapke sir?
Customer: Ye kareeban around ho gaye isko teen char month ho gaya.
Executive: Teen char mahine pehle deal hui thi?
Customer: Haan. Mere ko banda ghuma raha tha aaj dal dunga kal dal dunga.
Customer: Jab se fir mera phone hi usne block kar diya.
Customer: Ye Super Sana Gold karke hai.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Super Sana Gold karke invoice aapne banaya hai, ye Super Sana Gold kya hai sir?
Customer: Ye to ye to mera bill hai na, maine bill banakar bheja usko.
Executive: Ye jo upar Super Sana Gold likha hua hai sir, ye kya hai matlab? Haan samajh ye samajh mein nahi aa raha ye kya hai?
Customer: Ye ye to aise hi naam hai sir, normal naam hai.
Executive: Kis cheez ka naam hai? Matlab company ka naam hai?
Customer: Meri company ka to Fine Moti Udyog hai, ye mera dusra naam hai jispe GST number nahi hai.
Customer: Ye local mein hum jo supply karte hain without GST to ye bill katte hain.
Executive: Sir to aapne ye Fine Moti Udyog se kyun nahi kati thi inke bill?
Customer: Kya hua?
Executive: Fine Moti Udyog wale invoice aapne kyun nahi inko provide ki thi sir?
Customer: Wo tax dene ko tayar nahi tha banda bola tax nahi dunga main isliye mere ko kacha bill katna pada.
Executive: Ye Kolkata se hai kya?
Customer: Tayaan Khushi.
Customer: Haan ye Kolkata se hai.
Executive: [unintelligible] X.
Executive: Lekin main to dekh raha tha sir inki company ko hamare paas jo hai matlab paid supplier bhi nahi hai sir.
Executive: Inhone pay bhi nahi kar rakha hai services ke liye, IndiaMART mein ye registered bhi nahi hai company.
Executive: To ye aise hi buyer hai normal buyer hai matlab ek tarike se inhone contact kiya tha aur IndiaMART ke through inhone matlab aapko contact kiya tha kya?
Customer: Haan aur kya IndiaMART ke through contact kiya tha bhai maine bylead message aaya tha mere paas.
Executive: Ji ji. To sir aapne matlab bina paise liye mal kaise release kar diya sir?
Customer: Aisa hai ye banda mere se baat karne laga bolne lag gaya main aapko payment kar dunga.
Customer: Isne mere ko 4000 bhi dale hai isme se.
Executive: 4000 rupay inhone pay kiye hai aapko aur kitne ki total deal thi aapki?
Customer: 12000 something ki thi.
Executive: 11222 ki deal thi?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur isme se 4000 aapko inhone dal diye aur kahe ke baki payment aap?
Customer: Haan ye bola baki payment mere paas mal receive hote hi main aap invoice kat dunga aapko. Kuch issue chal raha hai network ka abhi ho nahi raha main chalo theek hai koi baat nahi bhai baad mein kar dena.
Executive: Aur pehli baar deal kar rahe the aap sir usse?
Customer: Haan pehli baar deal kar raha tha main.
Executive: Achha bhaiya to fir aap ek cheez ka dhyan rakhiyega aage bhi ki kisi bhi buyer hai chahe wo offline party mein bhi aap aise hi karte hain kya koi party agar aayi aap se agar keh rahi hai ki mal de dijiye hum paisa de denge to aap de dete hain kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi bilkul nahi.
Executive: To wahi hai na sir offline mein bhi aap ye cheez nahi karte honge. To online mein bhi main aapko batata hu sir ye to aaj ke time mein sir fraud karne wale bahut sare log baithe hue hain is duniya mein. Jo fraud karna chahte hain kisi ka bhi fraud kar denge thoda sa bhi mithi mithi baatein karke. Lekin ab agar aap online market mein utre hain sir to online mein aapko bahut tarike ke log milenge acche log bhi milenge bekar log bhi milenge jo fraud karne wale hain wo bhi milenge aur jo business aapko dene wale hain jinko sach mein product ki need hai wo bhi milenge. Lekin aapko apne tarika ek banana hoga sir business karne ka IndiaMART mein jo bhi supplier business karta hai sir main matlab dekha hu ki koi bhi supplier sir bina payment ke mal release nahi karta hai. Aur kam se kam agar part payment ki bhi deal hoti hai agar kisi buyer se aapki ki wo hai bolta hai ki mujhe paisa main thoda release kar raha hu to at least aap utna paisa release karwa lo jitna ke aapka mal hai. Ji ji. Kam se kam 870 70% jaise 30% aapka margin hai to 30% margin ko chod ke at least jitna mal ka paisa hai jitna product ka aapki costing hai wo at least aap unse pehle payment karwa lijiye jisse kam se kam aapka agar nuksan bhi hota hai sir to usme aapke mal ka paisa to nikal jata hai. Bilkul bilkul. Lekin aage se sir aap bilkul dhyan rakhiyega in cheezon ka aur isme main aage concern hamari usme inke account mein dalta hu to inka account yahan se matlab abhi to free hi account hai. To inko koi registered nahi karega aage se inke paas red aa jayega. Ji ji.
Executive: Aur aage main aapko inform kar raha hu sir aaj ki deal kisi se bhi mat kijiye sir ye to sir abhi matlab ki normal hai main aapko batau aisi aisi parties hai matlab ki jinse aise hi fraud mein buyer ne contact kiya contact karne ke baad se baatein karke matlab teen teen char char lakh rupay ka bhi sir mal manga ke aur wahan se mal leke chale gaye aur party ko ek rupay ka bhi nahi mila. Bilkul bilkul.
Executive: To aap is cheez ka dhyan rakhiyega baki isme to sir agar hamare ye paid supplier hote agar hamare paas inka account hota ye hum logo ko pay kar rahe hote to hum main inka account tak block karwa dete sir. Jaise koi aisa supplier ho jo IndiaMART pe already pay kar raha ho services ka. Hmm. To unka hum account tak block karwa dete hain. Achha mera ek pehle ka hai par uska bhi mere ko koi benefit nahi mila. Pehle ka aapka kya hai sir? Maine pehle bhi complaint kara hua hai ek Surat ke Sahil Bhakhadiya karke unka naam hai. Yahan pe aapki last jo complaint thi ek Fashion Hub ne kari thi sir aapko Bangaluru se. Ye aapki 29 July ki thi isme 13000 ka crystal bangle ki deal hui thi. Nahi nahi isse isse pehle ek aur thi. Isse pehle ek Nawaz Enterprises Mumbai ko aapne deal ki thi. Haan haan usne bhi usne bhi nahi dala mere ko payment. Usse pehle ek aur. Ek minute. Sir aapke sath ye pehle cheeze ho chuki hai sir to aap thoda sa dhyan mein rakh ke cheezon ko deal karte sir. Nawaz Enterprises wale sir ab main bilkul aage se bilkul dhyan dunga sir ab to main matlab koi sawal hi nahi hai aisa karne ka. Sir hum IndiaMART kya karta hai na IndiaMART aapko bas buyer se connect karata hai ab jaise koi bhi buyer agar aapki retail shop bhi hoti hai sir to hum kya kare buyer aapke tak ja raha hai to baki aage zimmedari deal karne ki wo sari ki sari kahi na kahi aap apne hisab se usko deal karte hain paisa pehle lete hain saman baad mein dete hain. To same aap online mein bhi kiya kijiye aap is cheez mein mat rah lijiye sir ki jo hai ye order na de do aap order milna hoga milega nahi milna hoga nahi milega jo genuine party hogi wo order deke jayegi sir aapko aapki payment condition pe. Kyunki aap jo price aur jo quality aap provide karoge wo koi aur provide bhi nahi kar pa raha hoga isliye buyer dil se aapko paisa de raha hai. Ji ji. Bas is cheez ka dhyan rakhiyega sir baki to matlab hum ek side se hum yahan se complaint raise kar de raha hu aur inke account pe jaise hi matlab agar ye kuch account vagera registered karane ki koshish karenge to inke account hum registered nahi karenge aur agar already account hota to wo hum block karwa dete lekin main to pura check kar liya hu abhi abhi is naam se koi account Strydex naam se koi IndiaMART mein account nahi hai. Koi account nahi hai abhi filhal mein. Theek hai aap theek hai apna sir baki aur koi dikkat hogi main aapko Nidhi meri team mein manage account aapka manage kar rahi hai to aap Nidhi se bol dijiyega mere se baat karne ke liye main baat kar lunga koi problem aati hai to. Theek theek hai sir theek hai okay. Theek hai baki aapke paas sir jo hamari baat hui hai uske ek chota sa feedback jayega sir aapke mail pe hamari conversation ka aapke feedback. To usme satisfied mark kar dijiyega agar sari cheeze sahi rahi hongi. Theek hai sir theek hai. Theek hai sir aur kuch tak sahayata kar sakta hu main? Nahi bas sir dhanyavad. Theek hai sir thank you so much for your time sir. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer did not receive payment for delivered goods.

- Customer has faced similar issues before.



Resolution:

- Executive explained IndiaMART's role in connecting buyers.

- Executive advised caution in online transactions.

- Executive raised a complaint against the buyer.

- Executive will block the buyer's account if registered.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback on the call.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, payment, fraud, online safety, complaints
